brief_title: A Study of Viracept in AIDS Patients With Mycobacterium Avium Complex Disease (MAC)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if it is safe and effective to give Viracept to AIDS patients who are being treated for MAC.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must have: - HIV infection - New diagnosis of MAC bacteremia and < 7 days of therapy. Prior Medication: Allowed: Patients no more than 7 days of therapy for MAC disease. Exclusion Criteria Prior Medication: Excluded: Prior therapy (or less than 2 weeks) with protease inhibitors other than saquinavir.
